subsection.name: Download
subsection.p: First download jWebUnit from the files area and expand to a local directory.

subsection.name: Integrate with IDE
subsection.p: Make sure you add the jwebunit jar file and the jar files in the jWebUnit/lib directory to your classpath in your IDE.

subsection.name: Create test
subsection.p: Create your first webunit test. Start slow by asserting the title of your page.

section.name: Dependencies
section.p: The following dependencies are needed to run jWebUnit and are available in the lib directory. See this page for more information on the precise version numbers for each jar.

tr.td: Java library for the automatic stimulation and testing of web applications.
Javascript implementation in Java used by httpunit. Only needed if javascript in target application must be tested.
Java html parser and beautifier used by httpunit.
Common XML stuff needed by Tidy/HttpUnit.
